#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
   int T,x1,x2,x3,x4,y1,y2,y3,y4,ans;
   cin>>T;
   while(T--)
   {
      cin>>x1>>y1>>x2>>y2;
      cin>>x3>>y3>>x4>>y4;
      ans=(y2-y1)*(x2-x1)+(y4-y3)*(x4-x3);
      if(x2>x3&&y2>y3&&x4>x1&&y4>y1)
      {
         if(x1<x3)
         x1=x3;
         if(y1<y3)
         y1=y3;
         if(x2>x4)
         x2=x4;
         if(y2>y4)
         y2=y4;
         ans-=(x2-x1)*(y2-y1);
      }
      cout<<ans<<endl;
   }
   return 0;
}
